title: PHILADELPHIA, Here We Come!
body_text:
All roads lead to Philly - the city of Brotherly Love! Alright, that's not entirely true. Actually, it's not true at all!
One feared family forced to split up in this "Brother Brawl". 2007
ROOKIE of the Year
runner-up
Michael Butler
takes on elder sibling, the light, agile, and powerful
Jim Butler
.
The youngin' Michael reached the pinnacle of a dodgeball warrior's career headlining
DODGEBALL CX
back in early-November 2007, en route to establishing an impressive 2-1-0 standing. For Jimmy B, a real test of physical endurance and mental strength is exactly what he needs. It's been well-over a year since we've seen the "POWERlife" creator in a captains war of any kind. If he can defeat "M Bizzle", he may very well be one his way to a fantastic 2008.
But of course there's a swerve on this so-called "Road to Philly" ...
How about the wild card, 2008 presidential candidate Ron Paul! Will the Pennsylvania native and Republican Congressman pay a visit at DODGEBALL 121? He might just show, you never know. After all, can you think of any other non-player to earn a coveted cover shot on an
EastCoastDodgeball
poster!?
Whatever the case,
Butler vs. Butler
will be a showstealer. It all goes down January 12, 2008, at the Season 13 kicker! And don't forget about the "Butler Beat Box" to go with it!
body_html:
All roads lead to Philly - the city of Brotherly Love! Alright, that's not entirely true. Actually, it's not true at all!

One feared family forced to split up in this "Brother Brawl". 2007 ROOKIE of the Year runner-up Michael Butler takes on elder sibling, the light, agile, and powerful Jim Butler.

The youngin' Michael reached the pinnacle of a dodgeball warrior's career headlining DODGEBALL CX back in early-November 2007, en route to establishing an impressive 2-1-0 standing. For Jimmy B, a real test of physical endurance and mental strength is exactly what he needs. It's been well-over a year since we've seen the "POWERlife" creator in a captains war of any kind. If he can defeat "M Bizzle", he may very well be one his way to a fantastic 2008.

But of course there's a swerve on this so-called "Road to Philly" ...

How about the wild card, 2008 presidential candidate Ron Paul! Will the Pennsylvania native and Republican Congressman pay a visit at DODGEBALL 121? He might just show, you never know. After all, can you think of any other non-player to earn a coveted cover shot on an EastCoastDodgeball poster!?

Whatever the case, Butler vs. Butler will be a showstealer. It all goes down January 12, 2008, at the Season 13 kicker! And don't forget about the "Butler Beat Box" to go with it!
